description: Least number of edges in graph containing all trees on n nodes.
references: Chung, F. R. K.; Graham, R. L. On graphs which contain all small trees. J. Combinatorial Theory Ser. B 24 (1978), no. 1, 14--23. MR0505812 (58 #21808a)

Chung, F. R. K.; Graham, R. L.; Pippenger, N. On graphs which contain all small trees. II. Combinatorics (Proc. Fifth Hungarian Colloq., Keszthely, 1976), Vol. I, pp. 213-223. Colloq. Math. Soc. Janos Bolyai, 18. North-Holland, Amsterdam, 1978.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to trees
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _R. K. Guy_
